issue.title: [Rust] Datafusion CLI does not support registering Parquet files
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7889](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7889). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Registering Parquet files fails with the error that they are unsupported.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7889?focusedCommentId=17040799) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
Issue resolved by pull request 6456
